Posts.Content: Hi,thank you for the information, may I ask what is liver ablation ? Did you have it in your bones since 2013 ? And did u have IV chemo ? I go to St. Peter’s for my oncologist, and radiation...My Dr. is Dr.Mingii.. what ever they have In stored for me I still would like to get a second opinion..
Posts.Title: Met Breast cancer to the bones

Posts.Content: Any sisters had MCB spread to diff parts of the bones in diff areas, may I ask what treatment you had.. lost and scared üòü
Posts.Title: Met Breast cancer to the bones

Posts.Content: I actually have a appt for a Dr at Albany med on April 16th for a second opinion I will keep everyone posted.. thank you so much for responding
Posts.Title: Met Breast cancer to the bones

Posts.Content: Hi, I am based out of Albany Ny, I do go to American cancer center once a week for a group meeting, They contacted the hospital and told them how I was feeling, spoke to nurse navigator one time.. Never heard from her again..
Posts.Title: Depressed...tnbc

Posts.Content: Thank you so much I will read up on this now... I can’t sleep or eat thinking about “what if” I just don’t understand I go to the oncologist every 3mths how they don’t pick this up ? Especially spreading diff parts of my bones from pelvic area, ( which I was told today I will get radiation for two weeks on my whole pelvic area ) they also seen some spots on my shoulder / back of my neck area, and spread to the liver... i have faith and listening to other stories on here of it spreading to diff areas give me more hope that I will be one of these stories.. please share your stories and any suggestions.. thank you so much !
Posts.Title: Met Breast cancer to the bones

Posts.Content: Hi everyone, I’m from upstate NY, I was diagnosed with BC stage 2b almost 4yrs I did very well with treatment, going forward I just had a bone scan and they seen spots in my bones, I am beyond scared and very depressed, I’m waiting for pet scan and bone biopsy, Hearing from my Dr. that the cancer spread to my bone I was in shock and disbelief I was doing so good, Will I always have this depression feeling for the rest of my life ? I don’t want to get out of my bed, I’m scared to find out what I’m about to go threw for treatment, please if anyone how do you cop with this ? Is going there advanced bc painful, can some warriors respond that been going threw this for some years help me understand there is hope and I still do have years and years ahead of me...I’m lonely in upstate Ny ..I’m in a dark place right now and don’t know how to cope with depression
Posts.Title: Depression..

Posts.Content: Thank you for you reply’s, Everything is so overwhelming I feel lost and beyond scared.. I will keep everyone posted on my journey..
Posts.Title: Depression..

Posts.Content: Hi I go to oncologist at st Mary’s in Troy Ny, my Doctor is Dr.Mingi, part of st.peters group, I actually was looking today for a second opion and a new Doctor out of Albany Medical Center
Posts.Title: Depression..

Posts.Content: Hi, I recently have been diagnosed with stage 4 breast cancer, I was stage 2 back in 2015.. I completely understand how u feel, I fell into a depression, at the point I just lay in my bed after work and cry behind close doors.. I feel like my life expansion has been cut, the new normal is hard for me to kope with, I don’t want to buy anything new cause I’m afraid everytime I get a test done it’s not good news, to worry about blood work, pet scans, if chemo is helping and the day you hear that you have no more options for your cancer is frightening to me.. stage 4 is another new kind of normal to accept from the stage 2 I went threw.. I will always fight and Never Give up by all means.. I have two kids and a grandson I want to be there for as long as I can.. I had to cut /shave my hair again yesterday back to wearing scarves, so now comes the questions from people that suppose to be your friends or family.. I feel like I don’t want anyone to see me, only because of the questions..I have to learn to live life I will never be the same with CANCER but I have to remain strong to fight ! One day at a time for all of us survivors and thrivers üôèüèº
Posts.Title: The clerk called me "Sir" and my visit to Memorial Sloan Kettering.

Posts.Content: Hi I wrote her name down on a piece a paper, I’ll let you know, I know she is in the building across the street from Albany med, 50 new Scotland ave 5th floor
Posts.Title: Met Breast cancer to the bones

Posts.Content: Thank you so much ! I really needed to hear positivity ‚ù§Ô∏è
Posts.Title: Depression..

Posts.Content: Hi I recently was diagnosed with with tnbc stage 4.. I was stage 2 Er+Her2- in 2015..I just started on Abraxine one mths ago... I truly do not know how to handle my new normal.. My onc said it’s a chronic disease, not s death sentence, I literally think about dying every min of the day, it was so bad I thought about taking my own life.. I am not on any depression medication at this time ,I tried Zoloft it only made me sleepy for a hour..I read so many stories good and bad..My mind only thinks about CANCER..How do I kope with this reality ? How do I go back living my normal life ? I have two kids and a grandson that means the world to me, I will Never Give up and will fight this terrible disease ! Depression is a very serious illness.. I tried to get help with the hospital advocate, that was a total disappointment.. I felt as if I was begging for help.. I talked to her one time and never heard from her again..I come here because I consider inspire to be my outlet, people understand especially when it comes to Cancer... Hopefully I can get some encouraging words or positive stories from tnbc survivors... I feel like I’m in a totally dark space..
Posts.Title: Depressed...tnbc

Posts.Content: My oncologist actually referred me to the nurse navigator, I felt totally neglected from her, when I go in for Treatment she just walks be me..
Posts.Title: Depressed...tnbc
